text: maW/*ׂA<MER>' d@bar=y@hwA<TIP>h 'El=yiW@rA'e<ATN>l b*@ya<TIP>d mal@'Aki<SIL>y:

'Aha<MEH>b@t*iy 'Et@kEm<PAS> 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ZQP>h wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*A<MUN>h '<HPA>hab@t*A<ATN>nw* h<HPA>lw^o'='A<AZL>x `eWA<MEH>w l@ya<SIL>`<HPA>qob<PAS> n@'um=y@hwA<ZQP>h wA<SIL>'oha<TIP>b 'E<SIL>t=ya`<HPA>qo<SIL>b:
w@'Et=`eWA<TIP>w WAne<ATN>'tiy wA<SIL>'AWi<MEH>ym 'Et=hArAyw<PAS> S@mAmA<ZQP>h w@'Et=na<SIL>x<HPA>lAt<TIP>w^o l@tan*<MER>w^ot mid@b*A<SIL>r:

k*i<SIL>y=to'ma<AZL>r '<HSE>d<GER>w^om ruW/*.a<RBM>S@nw* w@nASw*b<PAS> w@nib@nE<MUN>h x<HQA>rAb<ZQP>w^ot k*o<MEH>h 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot he<MER>m*Ah yib@n<TIP>w* wa<SIL>'<HPA>ni<MUN>y 'E<SIL>h<HSE>r<ATN>w^os w@qA<SIL>r@'<MEH>w* lAhEm<PAS> g*@b<MUN>w*l riS@`A<ZQP>h w@hA`A<TEB>m '<HPA>SEr=zA`a<MER>m y@hwA<TIP>h `ad=`w^olA<SIL>m:
w@`e<SIL>yneykE<TIP>m t*ir@'E<ATN>ynAh w@'at*E<MEH>m t*o<SIL>'m@rw*<PAS> yig@d*a<MUN>l y@hwA<ZQP>h me`a<TIP>l lig@b<MER>w*l yiW@rA'e<SIL>l:

b*e<TEB>n y@kab*e<MER>d 'A<TIP>b w@`E<MUN>bEd '<HPA>donA<ATN>yw w@'im='A<MUN>b 'A<MUN>niy 'ay*e<MUN>h k@bw^odi<PAZ>y w@'im='<HPA>dw^oni<MUN>ym 'Aniy<TLP> 'ay*e<AZL>h m<SIL>w^orA'i<GER>y 'Ama<MUN>r | y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<RBM>w^ot lAkEm<PAS> hak*o<SIL>h<HPA>niym<PAS> b*w^oze<MUN>y S@mi<ZQP>y wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<ZQM>m b*am*E<MER>h bAzi<TIP>ynw* 'Et=S@mE<SIL>kA:

mag*iySi<MEH>ym `a<SIL>l=miz@b*@xiy<PAS> lE<MUN>xEm m@go'A<ZQP>l wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*E<MUN>h ge<SIL>'al@n<ATN>w*kA b*E<SIL>'<HSE>mAr@kE<ZQM>m Sul@xa<MER>n y@hwA<TIP>h nib@zE<MER>h h<SIL>w*':

w@ki<SIL>y=tag*iyS<AZL>w*n `iw*e<MEH>r liz@b*o<AZL>xa<PAS> 'e<MUN>yn rA<ZQP>` w@ki<MER>y tag*i<TEB>ySw* p*is*e<MER>xa w@xolE<TIP>h 'e<MUN>yn rA<ATN>` haq@riybe<AZL>hw* nA<GER>' l@pE<SIL>xAtE<RBM>kA h<HPA>yir@Y@kA<PAS> '<YET>w^o h<HPA>yiW/*ׂA<MUN>' pAnE<ZQP>ykA 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
w@`at*A<TEB>h xal*w*=nA<MER>' p@ney='e<TIP>l wi<SIL>yxAn*e<ATN>nw* miy*Ed@kEm<PAS> hA<MUN>y@tAh z*o<ZQP>'t h<HPA>yiW/*ׂA<MEH>' mik*Em<PAS> p*Ani<ZQP>ym 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:

mi<MEH>y gam=b*AkEm<PAS> w@yis@g*o<MUN>r d*@lAta<ZQP>yim w@lo<SIL>'=tA'i<MER>yrw* miz@b*@xi<TIP>y xin*A<ATN>m 'e<SIL>yn=li<AZL>y xe<GER>pEY b*AkE<RBM>m 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot w*min@xA<TIP>h lo<SIL>'='Er@YE<MER>h miy*Ed@kE<SIL>m:

k*i<MUN>y mim*iz@rax=SE<GER>mES w@`ad=m@bw^o'<RBM>w^o g*Ad<MEH>w^ol S@miy<PAS> b*ag*w^oyi<ZQP>m w*b@kAl=mAq<RBM>w^om muq@TA<MER>r mug*A<TEB>S liS@mi<TIP>y w*min@xA<MUN>h T@hw^orA<ATN>h k*i<SIL>y=gAd<MEH>w^ol S@miy<PAS> b*ag*w^oyi<ZQP>m 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
w@'at*E<TIP>m m@xal*@li<MUN>ym 'w^ot<ATN>w^o b*E<SIL>'<HSE>mAr@kE<RBM>m Sul@xa<MEH>n '<HPA>donAy<PAS> m@go'A<MUN>l h<ZQP>w*' w@niyb<TIP>w^o nib@zE<MER>h 'Ak@l<SIL>w^o:

wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*Em<TLP> hin*e<AZL>h mat*@lA'A<GER>h w@hip*ax@t*E<MUN>m 'w^ot<RBM>w^o 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot wa<SIL>h<HPA>be'tE<MUN>m g*Az<RBM>w*l w@'Et=hap*is*e<AZL>xa<PAS> w@'Et=ha<MUN>xw^olE<ZQP>h wa<SIL>h<HPA>be'tE<TIP>m 'Et=ham*in@xA<ATN>h ha<SIL>'Er@YE<MER>h 'w^otA<TEB>h* miy*Ed@kE<TIP>m 'Ama<MER>r y@hwA<SIL>h:

w@'Ar<MUN>w*r nw^oke<RBM>l w@ye<MEH>S b*@`Ed@rw^o<PAS> zAkA<ZQP>r w@node<TEB>r w@zobe<MER>xa mAS@xA<TIP>t la<SIL>'donA<ATN>y k*iy<TLP> mE<AZL>lEk@ g*Ad<GER>w^ol 'A<RBM>niy 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot w*S@mi<TIP>y nw^orA<MER>' bag*w^oyi<SIL>m:
w@`at*A<RBM>h '<HPA>leykE<TEB>m ham*iY@wA<MER>h haz*o<TIP>'t hak*o<SIL>h<HPA>ni<SIL>ym:

'im=lo<MUN>' tiS@m@`<PAZ>w* w@'im=lo'<TLP> tAWi<AZL>ymw* `al=le<GER>b lAte<DAR>t k*Ab<MUN>w^od liS@mi<RBM>y 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot w@Sil*ax@t*i<MEH>y bAkEm<PAS> 'Et=ham*@'erA<ZQP>h w@'A<SIL>rw^oti<TIP>y 'Et=b*ir@k<SIL>w^oteykE<ATN>m w@gam<PAS> 'A<SIL>rw^oti<ZQP>yhA k*i<MER>y 'e<SIL>yn@kE<TIP>m WAmi<MER>ym `al=le<SIL>b:
hin@ni<AZL>y go`e<MEH>r lAkEm<PAS> 'Et=haz*E<ZQP>ra` w@zeri<MEH>ytiy pE<AZL>rES<PAS> `al=p*@neykE<ZQP>m p*E<TIP>rES xag*eykE<ATN>m w@nAWA<MER>' 'Et@kE<TIP>m 'elA<SIL>yw:
wi<SIL>yda`@t*E<ZQM>m k*i<YET>y Sil*a<MUN>x@t*iy '<HPA>leykE<ZQP>m 'e<TIP>t ham*iY@wA<MUN>h haz*o<ATN>'t li<SIL>h@y<MEH>w^ot b*@riytiy<PAS> 'Et=lewi<ZQP>y 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
b*@riyti<MUN>y | hA<SIL>y@tA<MUN>h 'it*<RBM>w^o ha<SIL>xay*iym<PAS> w@haW/*.Al<ZQP>w^om wA'Et*@ne<SIL>m=l<MER>w^o mw^orA<TIP>' way*i<SIL>yrA'e<ATN>niy w*mip*@ne<MER>y S@mi<TIP>y nixa<MER>t h<SIL>w*':

t*w^ora<MEH>t '<HSE>mEt<PAS> hA<SIL>y@tA<MUN>h b*@pi<ZQP>yhw* w@`aw@lA<TIP>h lo<SIL>'=nim@YA<MUN>' biW@pAtA<ATN>yw b*@SAl<MEH>w^om w*b@miySw^or<PAS> hAla<MUN>k@ 'it*i<ZQP>y w@rab*i<TIP>ym heSi<MER>yb me<SIL>`Aw<SIL>͏on:
k*i<SIL>y=Wip@te<MEH>y kohen<PAS> yiS@m@rw*=da<ZQP>`at w@tw^orA<TIP>h y@baq@S<MUN>w* mip*i<ATN>yhw* k*i<TEB>y mal@'a<MER>k@ y@h<SIL>wAh=Y@bA'<TIP>w^ot h<SIL>w*':
w@'at*Em<PAS> sar@t*E<MUN>m min=had*E<ZQP>rEk@ hik@Sal@t*E<MER>m rab*i<TIP>ym b*at*w^orA<ATN>h Si<SIL>xat*Em<PAS> b*@ri<MUN>yt hal*ewi<ZQP>y 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:

w@gam='<HPA>ni<GAR>y nAta<DAR>t*iy 'Et@kE<TEB>m nib@zi<MER>ym w*S@pAli<TIP>ym l@kAl=hA`A<ATN>m k*@pi<RBM>y '<HPA>SE<MEH>r 'e<SIL>yn@kEm<PAS> So<SIL>m@ri<MUN>ym 'Et=d*@rAka<ZQP>y w@no<SIL>W@'i<MER>ym p*Ani<TIP>ym b*at*w^orA<SIL>h:

h<HPA>l<AZL>w^o' 'A<MEH>b 'ExAd<PAS> l@kul*A<ZQP>nw* h<HPA>l<TEB>w^o' 'e<MER>l 'E<SIL>xA<TIP>d b*@rA'A<ATN>nw* mad*<RBM>w*`a nib@g*ad<PAS> 'i<MUN>yS b*@'Axi<ZQP>yw l@xal*e<TIP>l b*@ri<MER>yt '<HPA>bote<SIL>ynw*:

b*A<SIL>g@dA<MUN>h y@hw*dA<ZQP>h w@t<SIL>w^o`ebA<TEB>h nE<SIL>`EW@tA<MER>h b@yiW@rA'e<TIP>l w*biyr<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im k*i<MUN>y | xil*e<MUN>l y@hw*dA<RBM>h qo<MEH>dES y@hwAh<PAS> '<HPA>SE<MUN>r 'Ahe<ZQP>b w*bA`a<TIP>l b*at='e<MER>l nekA<SIL>r:

yak@re<AZL>t y@hwA<GER>h lA'i<AZL>yS '<HPA>SE<MEH>r ya<SIL>`<HPA>WE<AZL>n*Ah<PAS> `e<MUN>r w@`onE<ZQP>h me'A<SIL>h<HQA>le<TIP>y ya<SIL>`<HPA>qo<ATN>b w*mag*i<MUN>yS min@xA<ZQP>h la<SIL>yhwA<TIP>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:

w@zo't<PAS> Seni<MUN>yt t*a<SIL>`<HPA>W<ZQP>w* k*as*<MEH>w^ot d*im@`Ah<PAS> 'Et=miz@b*a<MUN>x y@hwA<ZQP>h b*@ki<TIP>y wa<SIL>'<HPA>nAqA<ATN>h me'e<MUN>yn `<RBM>w^od p*@nw^ot<PAS> 'El=ham*in@xA<ZQP>h w@lAqa<MER>xat rAY<TIP>w^on miy*Ed@kE<SIL>m:

wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m `al=mA<ATN>h `a<PAZ>l k*i<SIL>y=y@hwAh<TLP> he`i<AZL>yd b*e<SIL>yn@kA<GER> w*be<MUN>yn | 'e<MUN>SEt n@`w*rE<RBM>ykA '<HPA>SE<MEH>r 'at*Ah<PAS> b*Aga<MUN>d@t*Ah b*A<ZQP>h* w@hi<MER>y' x<HPA>bEr@t*@kA<TIP> w@'e<MER>SEt b*@riytE<SIL>kA:

w@lo<SIL>'='ExA<MUN>d `AWA<RBM>h w*S@'A<MER>r r<AZL>w*xa<PAS> l<ZQP>w^o w*mAh<PAS> hA<SIL>'ExA<ZQP>d m@baq*e<TIP>S zE<MUN>ra` '<HSE>lohi<ATN>ym w@niS@mar@t*Em<PAS> b*@r<MUN>w*x<HPA>kE<ZQP>m w*b@'e<MER>SEt n@`w*rE<TIP>ykA 'al=yib@g*o<SIL>d:

k*i<SIL>y=WAne<MUN>' Sal*a<RBM>x 'Ama<MEH>r y@hwAh<PAS> '<HSE>lohe<MUN>y yiW@rA'e<ZQP>l w@kis*A<MEH>h xAmAs<PAS> `al=l@bw*S<ZQP>w^o 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>w^ot w@niS@mar@t*E<MER>m b*@r<SIL>w*x<HPA>kE<TIP>m w@lo<MER>' tib@g*o<SIL>dw*:

h<SIL>w^oga`@t*E<MEH>m y@hwAh<PAS> b*@dib@reykE<ZQP>m wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*A<MUN>h hw^ogA<ATN>`@nw* b*E<SIL>'<HSE>mAr@kE<RBM>m k*Al=`o<AZL>Weh rA<GER>` T<MUN>w^ob | b*@`eyne<MUN>y y@hwA<RBM>h w*bAhEm<PAS> h<MUN>w*' xApe<ZQP>Y '<MER>w^o 'ay*e<TIP>h '<HSE>lohe<MER>y ham*iS@p*A<SIL>T:

hin@ni<MEH>y Sole<AZL>xa<PAS> mal@'Aki<ZQP>y w*pin*Ah=dE<TIP>rEk@ l@pAnA<ATN>y w*pit@'om<TLP> yAb<AZL>w^o' 'El=he<SIL>ykAl<GER>w^o hA<SIL>'Ad<MUN>w^on | '<HPA>SEr='at*E<MUN>m m@baq@Si<RBM>ym w*mal@'a<AZL>k@ hab*@ri<GER>yt '<HPA>SEr='at*E<MEH>m x<HPA>peYiym<PAS> hin*eh=bA<ZQP>' 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
w*mi<MEH>y m@kal@k*el<PAS> 'Et=y<MUN>w^om b*w^o'<ZQP>w^o w*mi<MER>y hA<SIL>`ome<TIP>d b*@herA<SIL>'w^ot<ATN>w^o k*iy=hw*'<PAS> k*@'e<MUN>S m@YAre<ZQP>p w*k@bori<TIP>yt m@kab*@si<SIL>ym:

w@yASa<AZL>b m@YAre<MEH>p w*m@Taher<PAS> k*E<ZQP>sEp w@Tiha<MEH>r 'Et=b*@ne<SIL>y=lewiy<PAS> w@ziq*a<MUN>q 'otA<ZQP>m k*az*AhA<TIP>b w@kak*A<ATN>sEp w@hAyw*<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h mag*iySe<MER>y min@xA<TIP>h b*iY@dAqA<SIL>h:
w@`A<SIL>r@bAh<PAS> la<SIL>yhwA<ZQP>h min@xa<MER>t y@hw*dA<TIP>h wiyr<SIL>w*SAlA<ATN>im k*iyme<MUN>y `w^olA<ZQP>m w*k@SAni<TIP>ym qad@mo<SIL>niy*o<SIL>t:

w@qA<SIL>rab@t*i<MUN>y '<HPA>leykEm<ZIN> lam*iS@p*AT<AST> w@hAyi<MUN>ytiy | `e<MUN>d m@mahe<RBM>r b*a<SIL>m@kaW/*.@piym<PAS> w*bam@nA<MUN>'<HPA>pi<ZQP>ym w*ban*iS@b*A`i<TIP>ym laW/*.A<ATN>qEr w*b@`o<SIL>S@qe<MUN>y W@kar=WA<TLM>kiyr 'al@mAnA<AZL>h w@yAt<MEH>w^om w*maT*ey=ger<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' y@re'<ZQP>w*niy 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
k*i<TEB>y '<HPA>ni<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h lo<MUN>' SAni<ATN>ytiy w@'at*E<MER>m b*@ne<SIL>y=ya`<HPA>qo<TIP>b lo<MER>' k@liytE<SIL>m:

l@miyme<AZL>y '<HPA>bo<SIL>teykE<GER>m sar@t*E<MEH>m me<SIL>xuq*ay<PAS> w@lo<MUN>' S@mar@t*E<ZQP>m S<MEH>w*bw* 'elay<PAS> w@'AS<MUN>w*bAh '<HPA>leykE<ZQP>m 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>w^ot wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*E<MER>h nAS<SIL>w*b:

h<HPA>yiq@b*a<AZL>` 'AdA<GER>m '<HSE>lohi<RBM>ym k*i<MEH>y 'at*Em<PAS> qo<SIL>b@`i<MUN>ym 'oti<ZQP>y wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<TIP>m b*am*E<MUN>h q@ba<SIL>`<HPA>n<ATN>w*kA ha<SIL>m*a`<HPA>We<TIP>r w@hat*@rw*mA<SIL>h:
b*am*@'erAh<PAS> 'at*E<MUN>m ne<SIL>'Ari<ZQP>ym w@'oti<TIP>y 'at*E<MUN>m qo<SIL>b@`i<ATN>ym hag*<TIP>w^oy k*ul*<SIL>w^o:

hAbi<AZL>y'w* 'Et=k*Al=ha<SIL>m*a`<HPA>We<GER>r 'El=b*e<MUN>yt hA<SIL>'w^oYA<RBM>r wiyhi<MER>y TE<AZL>rEp<PAS> b*@beyti<ZQP>y w*b@xAn<MEH>w*niy nA'<PAS> b*Azo<ZQP>'t 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ATN>w^ot 'im=lo<DAR>' 'Ep@t*a<MUN>x lAkE<RBM>m 'e<YET>t '<HPA>rub*<MUN>w^ot haW/*.Ama<ZQP>yim wah<HPA>ri<SIL>yqoti<MER>y lAkE<TEB>m b*@rAkA<TIP>h `ad=b*@liy=dA<SIL>y:

w@gA<SIL>`ar@t*i<MEH>y lAkEm<PAS> b*A<SIL>'oke<ZQP>l w@lo<SIL>'=yaS@xi<MER>t lAkE<TIP>m 'Et=p*@ri<MUN>y hA<SIL>'<HPA>dAmA<ATN>h w@lo<SIL>'=t@Sak*e<AZL>l lAkE<MEH>m hag*E<AZL>pEn<PAS> b*aW/*ׂAdE<ZQP>h 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
w@'iW/*.@r<MER>w* 'Et@kE<TIP>m k*Al=hag*w^oyi<ATN>m k*i<SIL>y=tih@y<MEH>w* 'at*Em<PAS> 'E<MUN>rEY xe<ZQP>pEY 'Ama<TIP>r y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
xA<SIL>z@q<MER>w* `Ala<TEB>y d*ib@reykE<TIP>m 'Ama<MUN>r y@hwA<ATN>h wa<SIL>'<HPA>mar@t*E<ZQM>m mah=n*id@b*a<TIP>r@nw* `AlE<SIL>ykA:

'<HPA>mar@t*E<ZQM>m SA<TIP>w@' `<HPA>bo<MUN>d '<HSE>lohi<ATN>ym w*mah=b*E<RBM>Ya` k*i<MEH>y SAma<AZL>r@nw*<PAS> miS@mar@t*<ZQP>w^o w@ki<MEH>y hAla<AZL>k@nw*<PAS> q@do<MUN>ran*i<ZQP>yt mip*@ne<TIP>y y@hwA<MER>h Y@bA'<SIL>w^ot:
w@`at*A<ZQM>h '<HPA>na<TIP>x@nw* m@'aW/*.@ri<MUN>ym zedi<ATN>ym g*am=nib@nw*<PAS> `oWe<MUN>y riS@`A<ZQP>h g*a<DAR>m b*A<SIL>x<HPA>n<TEB>w* '<HSE>lohi<TIP>ym way*im*Ale<SIL>Tw*:

'A<DAR>z nid@b*@r<TEB>w* yir@'e<MER>y y@hwA<TIP>h 'i<MUN>yS 'El=re`e<ATN>hw* way*aq@Se<MEH>b y@hwAh<PAS> way*iS@mA<ZQP>` wa<TLM>y*ik*Ateb se<MUN>pEr zik*Ar<MEH>w^on l@pAnAyw<PAS> l@yir@'e<MUN>y y@hwA<ZQP>h w*l@xo<SIL>S@be<TIP>y S@m<SIL>w^o:

w@hA<MUN>yw* li<RBM>y 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot lay*<ZQM>w^om '<HPA>SE<MER>r '<HPA>ni<TIP>y `oWE<MUN>h s@gul*A<ATN>h w@xA<SIL>mal@t*i<MUN>y `<HPA>leyhE<ZQP>m k*a<SIL>'<HPA>SEr<PAS> yax@mo<MUN>l 'i<ZQP>yS `al=b*@n<TIP>w^o hA<SIL>`obe<MER>d 'ot<SIL>w^o:
w@Sab@t*Em<PAS> w*r@'iytE<ZQP>m b*e<MER>yn Yad*i<TIP>yq l@rASA<ATN>` b*e<YET>yn `obe<MUN>d '<HSE>lohi<ZQP>ym la<SIL>'<HPA>SE<TIP>r lo<MER>' `<HPA>bAd<SIL>w^o:

k*i<SIL>y=hin*e<MEH>h hay*w^om<PAS> b*A<ZQP>' b*o`e<TIP>r k*at*an*<ATN>w*r w@hAy<AZL>w* kAl=zedi<GER>ym w@kAl=`oWe<MEH>h riS@`Ah<PAS> qa<ZQP>S w@liha<AZL>T 'otA<GER>m hay*<MUN>w^om hab*A<RBM>' 'Amar<PAS> y@hwA<MUN>h Y@bA'<ZQP>w^ot '<HPA>SE<TEB>r lo<SIL>'=ya`<HPA>zo<MER>b lAhE<TIP>m So<MER>rES w@`AnA<SIL>p:
